duties_responsibilities.duty: Facilitate internal and external squad interactions, and drive team efforts towards continuous improvement within a fast-paced and evolving environment.
Lead the Logistics Squad to achieve expected performance on the activities within its scope and aligned with the IT strategy.
Build trust, inspire, and support team members to overcome daily challenges using a servant leadership style.
Assess the Maturity (Lean/Agile) of the team and coach the team to higher levels of maturity, promoting collaboration.
Implement IT strategy by working with Team Members and Leadership to arbitrate on the build and run perimeters, adapt capacities, propose priorities, and control budgets.
Empower squad members to understand they can drive their own decisions while being available for customer concerns and arbitrations.

Coordinate and facilitate team ceremonies, high-level estimation, detailed refinement with resources for work units that will be delivered by the Logistics Squad or contribute to projects and/or other squad’s initiatives.
Collaborate with other Squads within the Worldwide Logistics Agile Release Train to ensure squad deliveries meet PI plan commitments.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Logistics, Supply Chain Management, or a related field (Master's preferred)
